IF(a.id>0,aq.title,NULL) aqTitle,IF(aq.id>0 AND aqapp.id>0,aqapp.title,aqspe.name) aqInfoTitle,

LEFT JOIN zl_answer a ON a.id = inform.iid AND IF(inform.type=2,1=1,a.id=0) LEFT JOIN zl_questions aq ON aq.id = a.qid LEFT JOIN zl_application_case aqapp ON aqapp.id = aq.iid AND IF(aq.info_class=2,1=1,aqapp.id=0) LEFT JOIN zl_specification aqspe ON aqspe.id = aq.iid AND IF(aq.info_class=1,1=1,aqspe.id=0)
LEFT JOIN zl_case_edit ce ON ce.id = inform.iid AND IF(inform.type=3,1=1,ce.id=0) LEFT JOIN zl_application_case ceapp ON ceapp.id = ce.aid
LEFT JOIN zl_characteristic ch ON ch.id = inform.iid AND IF(inform.type=4,1=1,ch.id=0) LEFT JOIN zl_specification chspe ON chspe.id = ch.spec_id
LEFT JOIN zl_dealerd_quotation dq ON dq.id = inform.iid AND IF(inform.type=5,1=1,dq.id=0) LEFT JOIN zl_specification dqspe ON dqspe.id = dq.sid
LEFT JOIN zl_customer_auth ca ON ca.id = inform.iid AND IF(inform.type=6,1=1,ca.id=0)
